initial_question.title: Failed to create screencast session: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.portal.Error.InvalidArgument: Unavailable cursor mode 1
initial_question.body:
ArchLinux + Hyprland 0.45.0

通过yay 安装了 wemeet-wayland-screenshare-git 包之后，手动在bash中执行了 wemeet-wayland-screenshare
显示出 Failed to create screencast session: GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.portal.Error.InvalidArgument: Unavailable cursor mode 1
且并没有显示出README,md 中步骤三的提示框

satisfaction_conditions: Screen sharing functionality works without cursor mode error
Package is installed with compatible cursor mode support
